io.fluxcd.toolkit.kustomize.v1.Kustomiza.description: Kustomization is the Schema for the kustomizations API.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.kustomize.v1.Kustomiza.description: KustomizationSpec defines the configuration to calculate the desired state from a Source using Kustomize.

interval.description: The interval at which to reconcile the Kustomization. This interval is approximate and may be subject to jitter to ensure efficient use of resources.

retryInterval.description: The interval at which to retry a previously failed reconciliation. When not specified, the controller uses the KustomizationSpec.Interval value to retry failures.

timeout.description: Timeout for validation, apply and health checking operations. Defaults to Interval duration.

sourceRef.description: Reference of the source where the kustomization file is.

path.description: Path to the directory containing the kustomization.yaml file, or the set of plain YAMLs for which a kustomization.yaml should be generated. Defaults to None, which translates to the root path of the SourceRef.

targetNamespace.description: TargetNamespace sets or overrides the namespace in the kustomization.yaml file.

dependsOn.description: DependsOn may contain a meta.NamespacedObjectReference slice with references to Kustomization resources that must be ready before this Kustomization can be reconciled.

suspend.description: This flag tells the controller to suspend subsequent kustomize executions.

force.description: Force instructs the controller to recreate resources that are not immutable and cannot be patched using server-side apply.

wait.description: Wait instructs the controller to check the health of all the reconciled resources.

patches.description: Strategic merge and target JSON patches, defined as inline YAML objects.

postBuild.description: PostBuild describes which actions to perform on the YAML manifest generated by building the kustomize overlay.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.kustomize.v1.CrossName.description: CrossNamespaceSourceReference contains enough information to let you locate the typed Kubernetes resource object at cluster level.

namespace.description: Namespace of the referent, defaults to the namespace of the Kubernetes resource that contains the reference.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.kustomize.v1.Namespace.description: NamespacedObjectReference contains enough information to locate the referenced Kubernetes resource object in any namespace.

namespace.description: Namespace of the referent, when not specified it acts as LocalObjectReference.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.kustomize.v1.Patch.description: Patch contains an inline StrategicMerge or JSON6902 patch, and the target the patch should be applied to.

patch.description: Patch contains an inline StrategicMerge patch or an inline JSON6902 patch with an array of operation objects.

target.description: Target points to the resources that the patch document should be applied to.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.kustomize.v1.Selector.description: Selector specifies a set of resources.

group.description: Group is the API group to select resources from.

version.description: Version is the API version to select resources from.

kind.description: Kind is the API kind to select resources from.

labelSelector.description: LabelSelector is a string that follows the label selection expression.

annotationSelector.description: AnnotationSelector is a string that follows the label selection expression.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.kustomize.v1.PostBuild.description: PostBuild describes which actions to perform on the YAML manifest generated by building the kustomize overlay.

substitute.description: Substitute holds a map of key/value pairs. The variables defined in your YAML manifests that match any of the keys defined in the map will be substituted with the set value.

substituteFrom.description: SubstituteFrom holds references to ConfigMaps and Secrets containing the variables and their values to be substituted in the YAML manifests.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.kustomize.v1.Substitut.description: SubstituteReference contains a reference to a resource containing the variables name and value.

kind.description: Kind of the values referent, valid values are ConfigMap or Secret.

name.description: Name of the values referent. The valuesKey is a required field.

optional.description: Optional indicates whether the referenced resource must exist, or whether to tolerate its absence.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.kustomize.v1.Kustomiza.description: KustomizationStatus defines the observed state of a Kustomization.

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the last observed generation of the Kustomization object.

conditions.description: Conditions holds the conditions for the Kustomization.

lastAttemptedRevision.description: LastAttemptedRevision is the revision of the last reconciliation attempt.

lastHandledReconcileAt.description: LastHandledReconcileAt holds the value of the most recent reconcile request value.

io.fluxcd.toolkit.kustomize.v1.Condition.description: Condition contains details for one aspect of the current state of this API Resource.

reason.description: Reason contains a programmatic identifier indicating the reason for the condition's last transition.

message.description: Message is a human readable message indicating details about the transition.

lastTransitionTime.description: LastTransitionTime is the last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

io.k8s.apimachinery.pkg.apis.meta.v1.Obj.description: ObjectMeta is metadata that all persisted resources must have.

name.description: Name must be unique within a namespace.

namespace.description: Namespace defines the space within which each name must be unique.

labels.description: Map of string keys and values that can be used to organize and categorize objects.

annotations.description: Annotations is an unstructured key value map stored with a resource that may be set by external tools.
